summary.para: Controls aspects of the behavior of the and methods.

remarks.para: If the OLEGETMONIKER_FORCEASSIGN flag causes a container to create a moniker for the object, the container should notify the object by calling the method.

summary.para: If a moniker for the object or container does not exist, should return E_FAIL and not assign a moniker.
If a moniker for the object or container does not exist, should create one.
can release the object's moniker (although it is not required to do so). This constant is not valid in .

If a moniker for the object does not exist, can create a temporary moniker that can be used for display purposes () but not for binding. This enables the object server to return a descriptive name for the object without incurring the overhead of creating and maintaining a moniker until a link is actually created.
